name: aki-sta
description: 空きスタサーチくん - モノリポ管理用

scripts.start:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:7071 && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:scraper && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,scraper,e2e" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:scraper" "npm run test:e2e"
scripts.cosmos:test: npm run sync:env && cd functions && node test-cosmos-connection.js
scripts.cosmos:migrate: npm run sync:env && cd functions && node scripts/migrate-to-cosmos.js
scripts.cosmos:setup: npm run sync:env && npm run cosmos:test && npm run cosmos:migrate
